Formlabs - Boston, MA - Full Time

Algorithms Engineer

The Job:

- Develop world class desktop 3D printer software with a focus on geometric algorithms

- Lead the development of cutting edge software features from inception to release

- Serious, low level, high performance coding

Software is at the center of our product development, as it bridges the transition from digital models to beautiful physical form in 3D printing. If you are a talented engineer and youâ€™re ready to dirty your hands with 3D geometric algorithms and other puzzling problems, we want you to join our team.
